Uses of Class
org.resthub.core.context.AbstractParser

Packages that use AbstractParser
org.resthub.core.context.jaxb Context scanning implementation for JAXB elements 
org.resthub.core.context.persistence Context scanning implementation for JPA2 entities 
 

Uses of AbstractParser in org.resthub.core.context.jaxb
 

Subclasses of AbstractParser in org.resthub.core.context.jaxb
 class AbstractJAXBElementsParser
          This class provide utilities for xml binding resources scanning defined by a scanning configuration in application context.
 class JAXBElementsExcluder
          This class scan entities defined by a scanning configuration in application context and add all found entities, matching with specified configuration options, to the exclude list of persistence context in order to be managed later (on bean initialization phasis)
 class JAXBElementsIncluder
          This class scan entities defined by a scanning configuration in application context and add all found entities, matching with specified configuration options, to the include list of persistence context in order to be managed later (on initialization phasis)
 

Uses of AbstractParser in org.resthub.core.context.persistence
 

Subclasses of AbstractParser in org.resthub.core.context.persistence
 class AbstractPersistenceEntitiesParser
          This class provide utilities for entities scanning defined by a scanning configuration in application context.
 class PersistenceEntitiesExcluder
          This class scan entities defined by a scanning configuration in application context and add all found entities, matching with specified configuration options, to the exclude list of persistence context in order to be managed later (on bean initialization phasis)
 class PersistenceEntitiesIncluder
          This class scan entities defined by a scanning configuration in application context and add all found entities, matching with specified configuration options, to the include list of persistence context in order to be managed later (on initialization phasis)
